means: 治疗法( remedy的名词复数 )
改正，纠正，改进( remedy的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Such laws could protect the consumer from harmful or dangerous remedies.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的法规可以保护消费者免受有害或者危险药品的威胁。

sentence.Network_en: Many remedies effective in joint disease are primarily diuretic.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多对关节病有效的药品主要含有利尿成分。

sentence.Network_en: Why do intelligent people find quack remedies so appealing?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么聪明人会被江湖医术所吸引？

entry.def: A remedy is a successful way of dealing with a problem.

example.ex: The remedy lies in the hands of the government.
example.tran: 解决良策掌握在政府手中。
解决经济问题的良方妙策

entry.def: A remedy is something that is intended to cure you when you are ill or in pain.

example.ex: ...natural remedies to help overcome winter infections.
example.tran: 有助于治疗冬季传染病的自然疗法

entry.def: If you remedy something that is wrong or harmful, you correct it or improve it.

example.ex: A great deal has been done internally to remedy the situation.
example.tran: 已经做了很多内部工作对这种情形进行补救。

auth_sentence.content: That doctrine of sympathy which accompanies all remedies by association.
auth_sentence.res_content: That doctrine of sympathy which accompanies all remedies by association.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That doctrine of sympathy which accompanies all remedies by association.

auth_sentence.content: Only the remedies would then look entirely different!
auth_sentence.res_content: Only the remedies would then look entirely different!

auth_sentence.content: In most cases these remedies have not been widely adopted.
